name: Escape the Museum (itch) (Trapped Predator)
description:
Created by Trapped Predator as part of the Museums Game Jam 2021

An Escape-Room-like game where the player has to solve riddles using objects from different museums in order to mysterious ruins.

The player has entered mysterious ruins through a portal. To reactivate the portal he has to find and place the correct item on the pillars. In order to achieve that he has to search the ruins for items from the museums and inspect each object for clues. 

We want to encourage people to learn more about the objects by using the information in our riddles and hope to use the various items from different museums to create interesting and creative puzzles. 

Right now there are still only a few objects featured in the game, but we would like to add more in the future. 

Thanks for the 3D models to

  • Deutsches Bergbau-Museum Bochum – Leibniz Research Museum for Geo-resource
  • Deutsches Museum, Munich
  • Germanisches Nationalmuseum – Leibniz Research Museum of Cultural History, Nuremberg
